basics.name: Mark Ryan Guamos
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of professional experience, specializing in fullstack development, Java, SQL, and Javascript. A proven track record of managing large scale software engineering projects to support cloud deployments and integrations.

work.name: Cubework PH
work.summary: Led the development team, overseeing technical standards, code quality, and continuous improvement. Utilized AI tools to enhance productivity and automate workflows.
highlights: Established and maintained technical standards.
Ensured code quality and best practices.
Guided and mentored team members.
Planned and facilitated continuous improvement.
Leveraged AI tools to boost productivity and efficiency.
Integrated Generative AI solutions (Dify, n8n) to automate workflows.

work.name: Nextbank
work.summary: Developed and maintained cloud banking applications, utilizing IaC for deployment and management. Optimized code for performance and reliability, and implemented SQL performance improvements.
highlights: Developed and maintained cloud banking applications (Core Banking, Electronic Transfers/Payments, ATM Services).
Utilized IaC (Terraform) for application deployment and management.
Optimized code for performance and reliability.
Implemented SQL performance improvements.
Maintained and supported the application codebase.
Added new features based on client requirements.
Integrated with client systems and third-party providers.
Provided application support for multiple clients.
Leveraged AWS services for scalable infrastructure.

work.name: Shang Software Solutions
work.summary: Enhanced existing applications and resolved concurrency issues. Automated processes and regression tests (Selenium, Appium, Playwright). Developed custom monitoring tools. Utilized DevOps tools (CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes). Contributed to on-premise to Azure migration efforts.
highlights: Enhanced existing applications and resolved concurrency issues.
Automated processes and regression tests (Selenium, Appium, Playwright).
Developed custom monitoring tools.
Utilized DevOps tools (CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes).
Contributed to on-premise to Azure migration efforts.

work.name: Yondu, Inc.
work.summary: Maintained and optimized the application code (including SQL). Mentored developers on full-stack development. Revamped the application to modern standards.
highlights: Maintained and optimized the application code (including SQL).
Mentored developers on full-stack development.
Revamped the application to modern standards.

work.name: iServe Customer Management Solutions Inc.
highlights: Led a small development team.
Built a Legal Case Management System for a government agency.
Mentored junior developers.

work.name: New World Solutions Ltd
highlights: Maintained the application codebase.
Added new features to enhance functionality.
Assisted QA testing to ensure product quality.

work.name: ODGS
highlights: Maintained the application codebase.
Added new features to enhance functionality.
Provided application support.

work.name: AATi Technologies
highlights: Assisted with minor bug fixes while learning Java and its frameworks.
Created a tool to parse handwritten form values using OCR.
